divs: Sighting DetailsI have been a police officer for 30 years. i work in the hills of Kentucky so i have no nonsense in my life and work. I saw this object.and it was moving ay about 30 knots. I live 100 yards from where i had the sighting. MY wife was in the bathtub and the water was disturbed and ripples were in the water. I was not the only observer. I received a number of calls. one caller stated it came over his home and the lights were searching. His home is on top of one of the mountains here in Estill county. I did not report it for the same reasons pilots don't report a ufo. I am not a NUT. hopefully you can shed some light on what i saw. There is a U.S.ARMY base to the southwest. Nerve gas in kept there. I worked there in the 1960s in Inventory so i know what was there. also the U.S airforce used the radar there for their practice bombing runs. thank you for taking the time to read this report. as i stated before i am not a NUT. Moreover I am a person who believes nothing i hear and half of what i see. I saw this thing coming for some distance, it was moving very slow. not a blimp, not a helo. I am uneasy with things i don't understand.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Irvine
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I am a police officer, i was watching traffic when this delta shapped object came from the south west heading northeast. 200 feet altitiudeno sound except for a vibration.collision lights on all 3 corners. it was seen by a number of people.
